Route Description: HSR Corridor connecting North with South Central China
HSR from Wuhan to Guangzhou via Changsha
Mainland section of the Express Rail Link. HSR from Guangzhou to Shenzhen North Railway Station.
Mainland section of the Express Rail Link. HSR from Shenzhen North to the border of Hong Kong.
Hong Kong section of the Express Rail Link. HSR from the border of Shenzhen to Hong Kong.
